channel.title: CVE Feed for Akana -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Akana -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-3826|2024-07-02T15:50:45.298Z -- akana -- akana
item.description: In versions of Akana in versions prior to and including 2022.1.3 validation is broken when using the SAML Single Sign-On (SSO) functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-2796|2024-04-18T15:05:37.916Z -- akana -- community%20manager%20developer%20portal
item.description: A server-side request forgery (SSRF) was discovered in the Akana Community Manager Developer Portal in versions prior to and including 2022.1.3. Reported by Jakob Antonsson.

item.title: CVE-2024-2796|2024-07-01T14:25:07.966Z -- akana -- community%20manager%20developer%20portal
item.description: A server-side request forgery (SSRF) was discovered in the Akana Community Manager Developer Portal in versions prior to and including 2022.1.3. Reported by Jakob Antonsson.
